languages.text: "Вот, значит, куда завели тебя твои поиски, Паскаль. Даже не знаю, тот ли ты еще человек, что латал Глейто, или уже кто-то совершенно иной".

traits.locale_text: "Вот, значит, куда завели тебя твои поиски, Паскаль. Даже не знаю, тот ли ты еще человек, что латал Глейто или уже кто-то совершенно иной".

languages.text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."
languages.original_text: "Вот, значит, куда завели тебя твои поиски, Паскаль. Даже не знаю, тот ли ты еще человек, что латал Глейто, или уже кто-то совершенно иной".

traits.locale_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."
"So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."
"So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

"So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."
"So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

languages.text: 「つまり、お前の旅路が行きついた場所はここなのか、パスカル。グライトの修理をしていたあの頃のお前と、今のお前が同じ人物なのかどうか、もはや俺には分からない」
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、お前の旅路が行きついた場所はここなのか、パスカル。グライトの修理をしていたあの頃のお前と、今のお前が同じ人物なのかどうか、もはや俺には分からない」

languages.text: "Hierhin hat Euch Eure Suche also geführt, Pasqal. Ich weiß nicht einmal, ob Ihr noch derselbe Mann seid, der Glaito früher immer zusammengeflickt hat, oder etwas ganz anderes."
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: "Hierhin hat Euch Eure Suche also geführt, Pasqal. Ich weiß nicht einmal, ob Ihr noch derselbe Mann seid, der Glaito früher immer zusammengeflickt hat, oder etwas ganz anderes."

languages.text: « Voilà donc où votre quête vous a mené, Pasqal. Je ne sais même pas si vous êtes toujours le même homme qui réparait Glaito ou si vous êtes maintenant une tout autre personne. »
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà donc où votre quête vous a mené, Pasqal. Je ne sais même pas si vous êtes toujours le même homme qui réparait Glaito ou si vous êtes maintenant une tout autre personne. »

languages.text: «Conque aquí es donde le ha conducido su búsqueda, Pasqal. Ya no sé si sigue siendo el mismo hombre que remendaba a Glaito o si es otra persona totalmente distinta».
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: «Conque aquí es donde le ha conducido su búsqueda, Pasqal. Ya no sé si sigue siendo el mismo hombre que remendaba a Glaito o si es otra persona totalmente distinta».

languages.text: “看来，这里就是这场探索的终点了，帕斯卡。我无法确定，你依然是曾经那个为格雷托包扎伤口的人吗？还是说，你彻底变成了另一个人？”
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: “看来，这里就是这场探索的终点了，帕斯卡。我无法确定，你依然是曾经那个为格雷托包扎伤口的人吗？还是说，你彻底变成了另一个人？”

languages.text: "Bu görev seni çok değiştirdi Pasqal. Glaito'yu ve diğerlerini iyileştiren o eski adamdan eser kalmamış gibi."
languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."

traits.locale_text: "Bu görev seni çok değiştirdi Pasqal. Glaito'yu ve diğerlerini iyileştiren o eski adamdan eser kalmamış gibi."

languages.original_text: "So, this is where your quest has led you, Pasqal. I don't even know if you're still the same man who used to patch Glaito up or someone else entirely."
